description: Who says you can't have fun while fleeing for your life? Use the natural stone slide to escape the giant fire lizard!

puzzles.description: Make Dash turn on red lights when Dash moves backward.
puzzles.introduction: Dash turns red with excitement while being pushed backward up the slide.

hints.description: Link the state with a Move Backward cue.

puzzles.description: After the red light, make Dash play a brave sound when Dash moves backward again.

hints.description: Drag out the sound state. Choose something for Dash to say. Link the state with a Move Backward cue.

puzzles.description: After the brave sound, make Dash automatically turn on red lights again.
puzzles.introduction: Dash will keep talking while being pushed backward!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the red light, make Dash turn on green lights when Dash moves forward. After the green light, make Dash automatically play a silly sound.
puzzles.introduction:
Finally at the top of the slide!  
What happens when you give Dash a little push forward?

hints.description: Link the Red light to the Green light using a Move Forward cue. Link the Green light to the silly sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the silly sound, make Dash instantly start to move forward as fast as possible, with both wheels set to 80 cm/s.

hints.description: Drag out a Moving Basics state. Set both wheels to 80 cm/s in the forward direction. Link the state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After moving forward, make Dash wait for 3.0 s then stop. Then make Dash wait for 1.0 s and turn on red lights again.
puzzles.introduction: That was fun! Now create a loop so Dash can slide again.

hints.description: Link the Moving Basics state to the Stop state using a Wait For cue set to 3.0 s. Link the Stop state to the Red light using a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.
